name: Magic Piano Tile KPOP
description:
- Play your favorite songs!
- Challenge your friends and beat their score!

How to play:
- Touch the piano tiles several times to play the piano.
- Simple to play, but hard to master.
- Getting all the tiles in this high-speed music game is definitely not easy!

Game features:
- Excellent game design and flat graphics
- High quality piano music
- There is a large collection of piano songs
- Gaming experience smoother
- Collection of gems
- Add favorites
- Get experience, open new levels.
- 100% free music game


DISCLAIMER
----------------------------------
This is an unofficial fan-made application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Idols , their management teams, or their record labels.
